inlineContent.text: Get ready to dive into the world of SwiftParsec! In this section, we’ll introduce you to SwiftParsec and its powerful parsing capabilities. Whether you’re new to parsing or have some experience, SwiftParsec provides a user-friendly and expressive approach to building parsers. Prepare to unlock the potential of parsing with SwiftParsec!

Let’s get started with building our CSV parser! In this section, we’ll set up the initial structure of our parser and explore the type parameters used in SwiftParsec. We’ll lay the foundation for our CSV parser and ensure everything is in place for the exciting parsing journey ahead.

chapters.name: Building a CSV Parser with SwiftParsec

inlineContent.text: Let’s embark on the fascinating journey of building our own JSON parser! In this tutorial, we will dive into the implementation of a JSON parser using the SwiftParsec library. While Swift already provides native support for parsing JSON using Codable, understanding the inner workings of a JSON parser can greatly enhance your understanding of parsing concepts.

chapters.name: Building a JSON Parser with SwiftParsec

csvlogo.png.alt: Building a CSV Parser with SwiftParsec

abstract.text: Get ready to dive into the world of SwiftParsec! In this section, we’ll introduce you to SwiftParsec and its powerful parsing capabilities. Whether you’re new to parsing or have some experience, SwiftParsec provides a user-friendly and expressive approach to building parsers. Prepare to unlock the potential of parsing with SwiftParsec!

doc://SwiftParsec/tutorials/SwiftParsec/.title: Building a JSON Parser with SwiftParsec

abstract.text: In this tutorial, we will explore the process of building a JSON parser using a tokenizer. While Swift already provides native support for JSON parsing using Codable, understanding the underlying principles and techniques can be valuable. We will leverage the power of SwiftParsec, which offers a GenericTokenParser type that simplifies the creation of tokenizers. By following this tutorial, you will gain insights into how JSON parsing works and enhance your understanding of parsing techniques in Swift. It’s worth noting that for most use cases, you can rely on Swift’s Codable protocol for JSON parsing. However, building a JSON parser from scratch allows us to dive deeper into the inner workings and principles of parsing in Swift. So let’s get started and build our own JSON parser!

doc://SwiftParsec/tutorials/SwiftParsec/.title: Building a CSV Parser with SwiftParsec

abstract.text: In this tutorial, we’ll walk through the process of building a CSV parser using SwiftParsec. The CSV (comma-separated values) format is commonly used for storing tabular data. We’ll leverage the power of SwiftParsec’s primitive and combinator parsers to create a robust and flexible CSV parser in just a few lines of code.

jsonlogo.png.alt: Building a JSON Parser with SwiftParsec
